title: First Path Following Field Test Setup
description: This was our first field test with autonomous path following in field settings. Taken as we prepare the robot to follow the path.

title: Collecting Data
description: The robot following the path as we are collecting onboard data.

title: 2022-2023 Season State Championship
description: Team picture after winning the highest award at the state championship, getting us to the world championship in Houston,TX.

title: Live Feed Test
description: Live feed of the cameras on the robot after setting up a pipeline to send data between a website and the robot.
